title: Results 2019
code: men <- teamstaffel::get_results("M", year = 2019) DT::datatable(men,               rownames = FALSE)

title: Results 2019
code: is_bwb <- grepl(men$team, pattern = "Berliner\\s?Wasserbetriebe") men_bwb <- men[is_bwb, ]  men_bwb$place_bwb <- seq_len(nrow(men_bwb)) men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, "place_bwb", dplyr::everything())  is_kwb <- stringr::str_extract(men_bwb$team, pattern = "[1-9][0-9]?") %in% 86:87 men_bwb$place_kwb[is_kwb] <- seq_len(sum(is_kwb)) #> Warning: Unknown or uninitialised column: `place_kwb`. men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, "place_bwb", dplyr::everything())   DT::datatable(men_bwb,               options = list(pageLength = 100),               rownames = FALSE)

title: Results 2019
code: women <- teamstaffel::get_results("W", year = 2019) DT::datatable(women)

title: Results 2022
code: men <- teamstaffel::get_results("M") DT::datatable(men,               rownames = FALSE)

title: Results 2022
code: is_bwb <- grepl(men$team, pattern = "Berliner\\s?Wasserbetriebe") men_bwb <- men[is_bwb, ]  men_bwb$place_bwb <- seq_len(nrow(men_bwb)) men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, "place_bwb", dplyr::everything()) is_kwb <- stringr::str_extract(men_bwb$team, pattern = "[1-9][0-9]?") %in% c(89,91) men_bwb$place_kwb[is_kwb] <- seq_len(sum(is_kwb)) #> Warning: Unknown or uninitialised column: `place_kwb`. men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, "place_bwb", dplyr::everything())   DT::datatable(men_bwb,               options = list(pageLength = 100),               rownames = FALSE)

title: Results 2022
code: women <- teamstaffel::get_results("W") DT::datatable(women)

title: Results 2023
code: men <- teamstaffel::get_results("M",                                  year = 2023,                                 event = "ALL")  DT::datatable(men,               rownames = FALSE)

title: Results 2023
code: is_bwb <- grepl(men$team, pattern = "Berliner\\s?Wasserbetriebe") men_bwb <- men[is_bwb, ]  men_bwb$place_bwb <- seq_len(nrow(men_bwb)) men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, "place_bwb", dplyr::everything()) is_kwb <- stringr::str_extract(men_bwb$team, pattern = "[1-9][1-9]?[0-9]?") %in% 115:116 men_bwb[["place_kwb"]][is_kwb] <- seq_len(sum(is_kwb)) men_bwb <- dplyr::select(men_bwb, "place_kwb", dplyr::everything())   DT::datatable(men_bwb,               options = list(pageLength = 100),               rownames = FALSE)

title: Results 2023
code: women <- teamstaffel::get_results("W", year = 2023, event = "ALL") DT::datatable(women)

title: Results 2023
code: is_bwb <- grepl(women$team, pattern = "Berliner\\s?Wasserbetriebe") women_bwb <- women[is_bwb, ]  women_bwb$place_bwb <- seq_len(nrow(women_bwb)) women_bwb <- dplyr::select(women_bwb, "place_bwb", dplyr::everything())  DT::datatable(women_bwb,               options = list(pageLength = 100),               rownames = FALSE)

title: Get Teamstaffel Results Table — get_results
code: get_results(   sex = "M",   year = 2022,   event = "ALL",   base_url = "https://berlin-wasserbetriebe.r.mikatiming.de" )

title: Get Teamstaffel Results Table — get_results
text: sex either "M" men "W" women default: "M" year default: 2022 event return overall results ("") selected starting day (.e. "ST1", "ST2" "ST3"), (default: "") base_url default: "https://berlin-wasserbetriebe.r.mikatiming.de"

title: Get Teamstaffel Results Table — get_results
code: women <- get_results("W") women #> # A tibble: 180 × 6 #>    place team                    start_number age_class finish_time event_name   #>    <int> <chr>                   <chr>        <chr>     <chr>       <chr>        #>  1     1 SCC - LA Hille-Friends  F607         Normals   01:37:34    5 x 5 km TE… #>  2     2 adidas Runners Berlin 1 F869         Normals   01:44:18    5 x 5 km TE… #>  3     3 SCC - LA TG Braun I     F615         Normals   01:44:21    5 x 5 km TE… #>  4     4 Polizei Berlin Frauen   M798         Normals   01:46:09    5 x 5 km TE… #>  5     5 adidas Runners Berlin 2 F870         Normals   01:48:55    5 x 5 km TE… #>  6     6 SCC Berlin - Hockey II  F631         Normals   01:49:39    5 x 5 km TE… #>  7     7 SCC - LA Maulwürfe I    F608         Normals   01:50:00    5 x 5 km TE… #>  8     8 KFH Humanmechaniker 2   F430         Normals   01:52:18    5 x 5 km TE… #>  9     9 LC RON-HILL Berlin F1   M636         Normals   01:52:54    5 x 5 km TE… #> 10    10 SCC - LA TG Braun II    F616         Normals   01:53:11    5 x 5 km TE… #> # ℹ 170 more rows
